::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was caught. His front end was in Serge's mouth. Serge's size and
stength, was begining to crush his hood. He punched 280 MPH. His tires
spinned at that speed. Hot Rod hoped to burn Serge's toung.
"You dont want to eat any spicy foods!"
